about_the_game:
Survive and push

past the monstrosities that will brade you! Push past what you couldn’t before, Adapt and survive to the end and make the Imperium proud! SHOW US WHAT YOU COULDN’T BEFORE. Adapt and Survive, and that will tell us if your worth anything more than just genetic material.

In our Universe

you are currently in the year of 3008, Located on what is left of Earth. The Imperials have set up a hidden operation located in the Alps, that is only friendly to the harshest of nuclear winters and storms. Much of Earths landscape has been bombed by a mix of Uranium and Zion Pure creating many Atomic Bombs that only left Mutants and the strongest of men to survive on the planet of Earth. You are an experiment, possible worthy to become a super soldier within the Imperial Military to fight off Separatist, PMC’s, Hostile Wild life, anything that stands against the Imperium you’ll fight against.



To keep things simple

you are one of many clones born in an experimental secluded area away from the tragedy of what is left of Earth and away from the wars currently being fought in the year of 3008. Fight amongst your brethren and survive amongst the Mutant monstrosities that are only of a test, of what really lurks in the depths of the galaxy.



You’ll be Reborn

every death back to your cell. From there you’ll choose when to be released again in your new body to see if maybe you learned something from the last death. Maybe you’ll actually make it to the End or maybe you won’t. No Check points, No Second chances, only in failure and death, you’ll learn to become better and maybe worth something more.



Get to the end and prove that you are worthy to become more than just

genetic material.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has a realistic atmosphere, where dismemberment is a possibility when avoiding monsters. Other Clone brethren in this criminal inhumane experiment might die along your side or kill you possible through means of force. Over all you and the other clones can die through various means.

The Death of Rebirth Teaser Trailer

name: The Death of Rebirth®

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB or Radeon R7 360, 2 GB or Intel Arc A310, 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game includes graphics settings to aid lower end devices. FSR Included, choosing between Dx11 or Dx12, optimized around 11 more stable on UE5
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB or Intel Arc A580, 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game includes graphics settings to aid lower end devices. FSR Included, choosing between Dx11 or Dx12, optimized around 11 more stable on UE5

short_description: A Single Player Parkour Sci-Fi Horror Survival Game Set in the Year 3008 where the Imperials have genetically made you to survive such harsh conditions on what's left of Earth in a controlled trial based environment.
